description: TRESemmé CONDITIONER VIOLET BLONDE SHINE 350 ML  Want to revitalise & enhance the colour of your blonde or silver hair? Want intense nourishment & healthy looking, shiny hair? Have Both!Our first range designed specifically for blonde and silver hair. A professional, quality system, with PEARL EXTRACT and VIOLET TONING PIGMENT to help neutralise brassy and yellow tones, revitalising colour and shine, while giving intense nourishmentHOW DO I USE IT?After shampooing with Violet Blonde Shine shampoo, follow with Violet Blonde Shine Conditioner to nourish and protect your blonde or silver hair. Evenly distribute conditioner on damp hair focusing on mid-lengths to tips. Leave in 2-3 minutes for extra nourishment and shine, then rinse thoroughly.OUR PHILOSOPHYFrom our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salonTRESemmé is dedicated to creating haircare products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylist and salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day.TRESemmé. Professional. At your fingertips.Goes Well With: Tresemme Violet Blonde Shine ShampooFor More Salon Secrets from Our Stylists, visit our TRESemmé. website  Violet Blonde Shine Conditioner with Pearl Extract and Toning Pigment  For blonde and silver hair  Neutralise brassy and yellow tones  For healthy looking and shiny blonde hair  Use it together with TRESemmé Violet Blonde Shine Shampoo for best result  TRESemmé Pro-Collection Range - Professional Care in Your Hands
name: Tresemme Purple Conditioner Violet Blonde Shine 350ml
